comments.html:
Few people understand.
Crypto is the future.
Bitcoin is a store of value.

Have fun staying poor!
comments.name: Henk

comments.html: I got down-voted to the ground, somewhere else this afternoon. For posting a joke about crypt. So let me give you this link here, just to be sure: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Poe%27s_law
comments.name: Henk

comments.html:
An article to bridge the silly season? ;)
Crypto currencies are just speculative bubbles to provide more evidence for the greater fool theory. Will be interesting to see how they react to more regulations (likely) to come. Maybe in the future there will be not much left to read about them.
comments.name: Anonymous
